content:
Hey! Jai soni has a PR to fix the fact that unread pills in the left sidebar are colored differently for topics vs. streams in dark theme (#21358), which looks odd. It would be great to get some feedback on which of the two colors we actually prefer (or if, e.g., we want to do something in between).

  1. stream-color-pills
  2. topic-color-pills

Overall I find the topic colors easier to read, so would prefer those if we're making a change here. That said, I think I actually like the fact that the background colors are a bit different; it makes it easier to visually scan.
OK, so Alya Abbott which direction would we like to go with now ?

Tim Abbott said:

Overall I find the topic colors easier to read, so would prefer those if we're making a change here. That said, I think I actually like the fact that the background colors are a bit different; it makes it easier to visually scan.

Hm, interesting. Having the colors be different really looks like an accident/bug to me.

What do other folks think?
Do we have any updates on this @Alya Abbott

I'm pretty OK with these having different colors, if we want to make that part of the design as trying to help with visually scanning what's going on.

But we have them the same as each other in light theme. So that isn't currently a principled part of the design; if we want it to be, we should pick distinct colors to use there too.

I agree that option 2, the color that's currently on topics, is easier to read. The color that's currently on streams makes a pretty light background for the white numerals, which isn't great contrast.

That feels to me like another reason to make them the same: make them both have the higher contrast that's on topics.
cool -- I'll update this PR and let you know. :)

Yeah, I think that's probably the best resolution for now. 2 colors might be nice ... but if we only have one color that looks good in the one theme that's using it, then it's probably a nontrivial design project to go back to having two colors.
@Jai soni make sure you update the right sidebar private message pills to match too -- we don't want to just move where the inconsistency is.

I think the next step will be to try making the colors the same in night mode.
